titleStmt.title: An Elegie on that great example of charity and vertue, the Right Honourable the Countess Dowager of Thanet who died on Monday the 14th of August instant, at the house belonging to that noble family in Aldersgate-Street.

notesStmt.note: Within mourning borders, with emblems and motto.
Imperfect: creased with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
